H0.text: By the year 2010 there were roughly how many bicycles worldwide. 500 million

H1.text: By the year 2010 there were roughly how many bicycles worldwide. 750 million

H2.text: By the year 2010 there were roughly how many bicycles worldwide. 200 million

H3.text: By the year 2010 there were roughly how many bicycles worldwide. 1billion

A4.text: More than 1 billion bicycles have been manufactured worldwide as of the early 21st century.
